doc.title: Reunion
doc.plot: Kim's Grandmother willed a house in the country to her that was built by her Grandfather after they moved from South Korea to escape the war. After her Grandfather passed, Kim's grandmother left the house, deserted and empty, more than 20 years ago. Kim and her friends go to the country to camp out a few days at her newly received gift; but when they get there, they realize that some new home owners are already there. Their unwanted guest are dealt with and Kim must find a way to survive.
